mapper.sql: COURIER_NUMBER, RETURN_DATE, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SEND_TIME, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, SHOP_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS_COST, GOODS, ORDER_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DATE, COURIER_STATE, FBD_AREA, TIME_OUT
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from SOURCE_ZM
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into SOURCE_ZM (COURIER_NUMBER, RETURN_DATE, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, CTM_BAR_CODE, CTM_NAME, SEND_TIME, PROVINCE, ADDRESS, SHOP_NUMBER, ADDRESSEE, PHONE, WEIGHT, COURIER_COMPANY, GOODS_COST, GOODS, ORDER_NUMBER, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_DATE, COURIER_STATE, FBD_AREA, TIME_OUT) values (#{courierNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sliceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenbu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ctmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shopNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{courierCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goods,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{courierState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fbdArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeOut,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
